name: Mock-Exam
instructions: This test paper consists of 90 questions. Each subject (Physics, Chemistry & Mathematics) has 30 questions.
Section-A: 20 Multiple Choice Questions (MCQs) → +4 correct, –1 wrong
Section-B: 10 Numerical Answer Type Questions → +4 correct, 0 wrong (no negative)
You have to attempt all 20 questions of Section-A and any 5 out of 10 from Section-B in each subject.
